Member Function Documentation

◆ dropMimeData()

bool rev::View::BlueprintModel::dropMimeData ( const QMimeData *  data,
Qt::DropAction  action,
int  row,
int  column,
const QModelIndex &  parent 
)
overridevirtual

To support additional drop actions, must be reimplemented to accomodate additional mimeTypes.

Note
Row and column are -1 when data dropped directly on parent
Parameters
[in]actionthe action ending a drag and drop operation
[in]rowthe row of an item in the model where the operation ended
[in]columnthe column of an item in the model where the operation ended
[in]parentthe index of a parent item in the model where the operation ended

◆ flags()

Qt::ItemFlags rev::View::BlueprintModel::flags ( const QModelIndex &  index) const
override

Return the flags for the item at the given index.

This indicates which items can be dragged and dropped

◆ mimeTypes()

QStringList rev::View::BlueprintModel::mimeTypes ( ) const
overridevirtual

Returns the list of supported MIME types.

Note
Reimplementing mimeData() and dropMimeData() because this is overriden
